Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Enacts the internet service outage consumer protection act
Summary: Enacts the "internet service outage consumer protection act"; requires every internet service provider operating in this state to issue a prorated bill credit to consumers for any internet service outage lasting more than one hour.
LawCode: Add ยง224-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to enacting the "internet service outage consumer protection act"
